SimplexMethod
Class Fraction

java.lang.Object
  SimplexMethod.Fraction

public class Fraction
extends java.lang.Object

Author:
Scott Palmer
Descripiton:
Fraction class creates a fraction and can perform basic arithmetic with fractions while reducing it to its lowest terms. For negative values the numerator hold the sign value.
